#!/usr/bin/env ruby
$s = ENV['TM_COMMENT_START'] $e = ENV['TM_COMMENT_END'] $m = ENV['TM_COMMENT_MODE'] $t = STDIN.read
$s_esc = $s.gsub(/./, '\\\\\&') $e_esc = $e.gsub(/./, '\\\\\&')
case $m when "line" if $t =~ /\A\s*#{$s_esc}/ print $t.gsub(/^(\s*)#{$s_esc}(.*)#{$e_esc}(\s*)$/, '\1\2\3') else print $t.gsub(/^.*$/, "#{$s}\\&#{$e}") end when "block" $re = /\A(\s*)#{$s_esc}(.*)#{$e_esc}(\s*)\z/m if $t =~ $re print $t.gsub($re, '\1\2\3') else print $s, $t, $e end end
